--smit:
☁️⚡ And the Lord lifted His voice from the heavens, saying,
“I shall smit thee in thy pride, and lay waste thy strongholds 🏰🔥,
for thou hast turned thy face from My law 📜❌ and walked in thine own counsel 🚶‍♂️.”
--plague:
🐜☠️ And the Lord spake unto the land, saying,
“Lo, I shall send upon thee a plague of creeping things 🐛 and pestilence unseen 😷,
until the cries of thy people rise like smoke before Me 🔥.”
--banish:
🌪️🚪 And the Lord stretched forth His hand, saying,
“Thou art cast out from My sight 👁️❌, and thy name shall be a hiss upon the earth 🐍,
for thou hast defiled the covenant of thy fathers 📜.”
--curse:
🕷️📉 Thus saith the Lord,
“Cursed art thou in thy going out and thy coming in ⛔🔁,
thy harvest shall fail 🌾💀 and thy days be numbered without joy 📆😢.”
--fire:
🔥🌩️ Behold, the fury of the Lord shall fall like fire from the heavens,
and the mountains shall tremble before Him ⛰️😨,
for His anger burneth hot against the unrepentant 😡🛑.”
--flood:
🌊⚰️ And He opened the windows of heaven,
and the deep gave forth its storehouse of waters 💧💧,
until the cities sank beneath the wrath of the Most High 🏙️⬇️.”
--bless:
🌟🙏 And the Lord looked upon thee with favor,
saying, “Blessed art thou among the people 🎉,
for thou walkest in My ways and keepest My word 💖📖.”
--restore:
🌿🕊️ Thus saith the Lord,
“I shall bind up thy wounds and breathe life upon thy bones 🦴✨,
for I am the Lord who healeth thee and restoreth thy soul 💫❤️.”
--silence:
🤫🌫️ And the Lord uttered not a word,
and there was silence in the heavens and in the earth ⏳,
for the sins of man weighed heavy upon the throne 😔⚖️.”
